site_title: Modular Spinning Toy by Robert E. Neale

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the simplest modular origami ever. It's the modular origami spinning toy by Robert E. Neale. It's made by assembling 6 water bomb bases together. You should really try it out. Below is the time table of the Tutorial! 0:00 Model Demo 0:11 Folding The Module 1:27 Module Time lapse 1:40 Model Assembly Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art
